title: Loving
description: Pride & Prejudice reloadedA modern love story.Smart and passionate.Ella is not much into the party life at school, she rather reads and blogs about books. When her best friend Zoe had a crush on Luca, a real good-looking casanova, she can not understand - until she meets him. Turns out he not only is extremely attractive but also intelligent and sensitive.Not to fall in love - simply impossible.
author: Katrin Bongard
